This is a list of [[Java Edition 1.6.2]] development versions.

== [[Java Edition 1.6.2 (pre-release)|1.6.2 (pre-release)]] ==
[[de:Versionen/Vollversion 1.6/Entwicklung#Vollversion 1.6.2]]

Pre-release '''1.6.2''' is the only pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.6.2]], released on July 5, 2013.<ref name=":0">{{cite|url=https://www.mojang.com/2013/07/minecraft-1-6-2-pre-release/|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/0/https://www.mojang.com/2013/07/minecraft-1-6-2-pre-release/|title=Minecraft 1.6.2 Release|date=July 5, 2013|website=Mojang.com}}</ref> Despite the version number being identical, this version differs in build from the full release.

This version was reuploaded twice later on July 5, 2013:
* The first time was to fix the <samp>server.jar</samp> and to fix an issue with paintings and item frames.<ref name="reupload1">{{tweet|dinner|353149442955804673|Pushing out a ninja fix for paintings & item frames...|5 Jul 13}}</ref>
* The second time was to fix more issues with the <samp>server.jar</samp>, as well as the vulgar language from [[Language|British English]] translation of [[sponge]].<ref>{{tweet|dinner|353158968333447168|Another ninja fix gone out... sorry :( Redownload the 1.6.2 server if you already had it!|5 Jul 13}}</ref>
This second reupload of the server became the full release of server version 1.6.2. The full release client is different from the pre-release client.

=== Changes ===
{{incomplete section|compare [[Java Edition 1.6.2#Changes]]}}

==== Mobs ====
; [[Horse]]s
* Now remember who tamed them.

; [[Zombie]]s and [[zombie pigmen]]
* Now have a chance to spawn as babies.
